content.question: Which of the following is the alternating harmonic series?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis raised to the n plus 1 power, and denominator n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis raised to the n plus 1 power, and denominator n to the fifth power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis raised to the n plus 1 power, and denominator 5 to the n power, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis raised to the n plus 1 power, and denominator 5 n, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity of, the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis raised to the n plus 1 power, and denominator n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
